Hi,

  I have written a test case which implements TestListener.  I have 
written my own startTest(), endTest(), addFailure(..), addError(..) 
methods.  I am populating my results in a TestResult object.  What I 
want to do is before each test case is run I want to store the name 
of the test case into the TestResult object.  I am putting in the 
code for capturing the name of the current test case being run in the 
startTest() method of the test listener.  I would like to know how do 
I store this name into a TestResult object.  Similarly I need to 
store the errors and failures.  I know this can be easily be done if 
I use only the TestResult.  But what I want is a test progress, so 
that the user knows what test is being run currently etc.  Please let 
me know.

thanks,
Sri
